document_data.name: Flame Sprite
document_data.mainbody: '''Flame sprites''' were a variety of [[sprite (creature)|sprite]]s, enhanced by [[elemental fire]], exclusively found around [[Mount Hotenow]] following the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.Personality: These sprites had fickle temperaments and an everlasting love of fire.{{Cite web/Neverwinter Developer Blog/CTA: Battle for the Bridge}}
document_data.Combat:
[[File:Flame Sprites.png|thumb|273px|''A group of flame sprites.'']]
Flame sprites typically fought with ''[[fire arrow]]s'' and a type of [[arrow]] that would temporarily daze their enemies.
document_data.History: These [[fey]] were the result of a well-meaning [[wizard]] seeking to provide the sprites that lived around the increasingly dangerous Mount Hotenow an edge in protecting their homes. The wizard used elemental fire from Mount Hotenow itself to enhance them.

Society.Relationships: Flame sprites sometimes partnered up with [[adventurer]]s in pursuit of greater fire.
